content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- PipeGroup connecting the boiler and offshore pump

### Copper plate furnace at position(0, 0) and position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0, 0) with coal (48) and iron-ore (45)
- Furnace (position 5, 5) with coal (46) but no ingredients to smelt

### Lab at position(2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 2, 2) with status NO_POWER and research set to automation

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough coal and iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. Check your inventory regularly to avoid running out of necessary materials.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before trying to insert them into furnaces. If you receive an error stating "No iron-ore to insert from your inventory," it indicates that your inventory does not contain the item you are trying to insert.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
